text: Emma Tremblay (born April 21, 2004) is a Canadian actress. Tremblay is known for her roles on the television series Supergirl and Wayward Pines, and the films Elysium, The Giver, and The Judge. ==Personal life== She is the elder sister of actor Jacob Tremblay. ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 2013 Elysium Matilda 2014 The Giver Lilly 2014 The Judge Lauren Palmer 2017 Juliana & the Medicine Fish Juliana Reid 2017 Wonder Michelle 2018 Night Hunter Faye 2022 Aliens Abducted My Parents and Now I Feel Kinda Left Out Itsy ===Television=== Year Title Role Notes 2013 Let It Snow Amanda Television film 2014 Santa's Little Ferrets Elsa Collins 2015 The Whispers Tania Episode: "Hide & Seek" 2016 Wayward Pines Lucy 7 episodes 2017 Loudermilk Lizzy Episode: "Invitation Only" 2017 Psych: The Movie Iris Vick Television film 2017â€“2018 Supergirl Ruby Arias 15 episodes 2022 Caught in His Web Gabby Television film ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2004 births Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Vancouver
